Skill.Name: Heal
Skill.Description: One of the first spells leaned by new disciples of the light, this spell mends the flesh of the target, healing minor or moderate wounds.

Skill.Name: Force Bolt I
Skill.Description: A simple application of arcane lessons of the weave, this spell projects a bolt of raw force toward the target.

Skill.Name: Fireball I
Skill.Description: The signature spell of the school of fire, this spell is always in high demand in large scale battles. Projects a blast of fire that explodes into an inferno upon reaching its target.
